wifi-tx.help: TX pin for serial connection to external device

wifi-rx.help: RX pin for serial connection to external device

wifi-debug.help: Enable debug output for WiFi drivers

wifi-ssid.help: The SSID to connect to if using a WiFi interface

wifi-security.help: WPA, WPA2, WPA/WPA2, WEP, NONE, OPEN

wifi-password.help: An optional password for wifi security authentication
